page.title: 14Places of Worship.
page.content: The first chapel,{Bethel Hen,}was built in 1820. Between 1890 and 1920 four other denominations had established churches in the village. At the end of the last century{St. {Paul's,}was built and the Baptists, {Methodists and Pentecostals } established churches during the early years of this century. In 1906 Bethel Hen was replaced by a larger chapel,{Bethel Newydd.} Since the '50s there has been a gradual decline in the numbers attending churches. The Methodist church has been demolished,the Pentecostals have left their Mission Hall and re-established their church in the former Baptist chapel and the Anglican and Annibynwyr Cymreig are struggling to maintain their numbers. The Sunday attendance at the three churches would not even fill one.
